newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia to buy two more Italian frigates - report.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia to buy two more Italian frigates - report.

text.p: Malaysia will buy two more corvettes from Italy, doubling its order for the light frigates to four, Business Times daily said on Thursday.
Quoting Defence Minister Syed Hamid Albar, the daily said an agreement on the purchase will be signed by the two government in the next few days.

Syed Hamid told reporters after a meeting with visiting Italian defence minister Beniamino Audreatta on Wednesday, that the four frigates were originally part of an Iraqi order which has fallen apart.
"Initially, we considered buying two, but then they offered us the other two," he was quoted as saying.
The price tag for the four vessels was not disclosed. Syed Hamid said final pricing for the acquisitions has yet to be finalised.
Reports last year said Malaysia was considering the purchase of two 650-tonne corvettes from Italy's Foncantieri after an initial purchase of two units.
